Command.CommandString: delete from WMS_BillMaster where BillID in ({0})

select detail.*,product.ProductName,product.CategoryName,Product.Unit,Product.ModelNo from WMS_BillDetail detail left join VCMD_Product product on detail.ProductCode=product.ProductCode where {0} ORDER BY RowID

select detail.*,product.ProductName,product.CategoryName,Product.Unit,Product.ModelNo,main.BillDate,main.Memo as MainMemo,Factory.FactoryName,0 as RowNum from WMS_BillDetail detail inner join wms_BillMaster main on detail.billid=main.billid left join CMD_Factory Factory on main.FactoryID=Factory.FactoryID inner join VCMD_Product product on detail.ProductCode=product.ProductCode where detail.BillID=@BillID ORDER BY RowID

select task.*,Product.ProductName,state.StateDesc from WCS_TASK Task inner join CMD_Product Product on task.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode inner join Sys_TableState state on task.State=state.State and state.TableName='WCS_task' and state.FieldName='State' where {0} order by taskNo

select ProductCode,(InstockQty-isnull((select SUM(UnStockQty) from View_ProductQty where billid!=@BillID and ProductCode=tmp.ProductCode ),0)) as StockQty from View_ProductQTy tmp where ProductCode=@ProductCode
update CMD_Cell set IsLock=@Lock from CMD_Cell cell inner join WMS_BillDetail sub on cell.CellCode=sub.NewCellCode where {0}
update CMD_Cell set IsLock=@Lock from CMD_Cell cell inner join WMS_BillDetail sub on cell.CellCode=sub.CellCode where {0}
update wms_pallet set productcode=@productCode,Quantity=@Quantity,Weight=@Weight,Memo=@Memo,Updater=@Updater,UpdateDate=getdate() where PalletCode=@PalletCode and RowID=@RowID

select cell.AreaName,cell.ShelfName, cell.CellName, product.CategoryName,pallet.PalletCode,pallet.ProductCode,product.ProductName, product.ModelNo, product.Spec,product.Unit,pallet.Quantity,pallet.LockQty,pallet.Indate from WMS_Pallet pallet left join VCMD_Product product on pallet.ProductCode=product.ProductCode left join View_CMD_CELL_ALL Cell on pallet.CellCode=Cell.CellCode where pallet.IsLock='1' and {0}

select cell.AreaName, product.CategoryName,pallet.ProductCode,product.ProductName,product.Spec, product.ModelNo, product.Unit,SUM(pallet.Quantity) as Quantity , sum(pallet.LockQty) as LockQty from WMS_Pallet pallet left join VCMD_Product product on pallet.ProductCode=product.ProductCode left join View_CMD_CELL_ALL Cell on pallet.CellCode=Cell.CellCode where pallet.IsLock='1' and {0} group by cell.AreaName, product.CategoryName,pallet.ProductCode,product.ProductName, product.ModelNo, product.Spec,product.Unit

SELECT task.TaskNo,task.BillTypeCode,task.TaskType,task.TaskLevel,task.PalletCode,task.CraneNo,task.cellcode,task.State, task.TaskDate,task.RequestDate,task.StartDate,task.FinishDate,task.AreaCode, BillType.BillTypeName,ProductDetail.ProductCode, Product.ProductName,Product.CategoryName,productDetail.Quantity, Product.Unit,ProductDetail.BillID,TableState.StateDesc,crane.CraneName, (case when Task.TaskType='11' then TASK.StationNo when Task.TaskType in('12','13','14') then Task.CellCode end) FromStation, (case when Task.TaskType in ('11','14') then Task.CellCode when Task.TaskType='12' then TASK.StationNo when Task.TaskType='13' then Task.ToCellCode end) ToStation FROM WCS_TASK Task left join WCS_TaskProductDetail ProductDetail on Task.TaskNo=task.TaskNo left join CMD_Crane Crane on Task.CraneNo=crane.CraneNo left join VCMD_Product Product on ProductDetail.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode left join CMD_BillType BillType on task.BillTypeCode=billtype.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState TableState on TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and TableState.FieldName='State' and Task.State=TableState.State where ProductDetail.ProductCode not in ('0001') and {0}
